Properties.ProtectedString:
--Updated for R15 avatar by StarWars
local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote") local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local Heartbeat = game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat
Handle.Transparency = 1
local Equipping = false local Equipped = false
local Feet = {} local FootFrame = CFrame.new(0, -0.7, 0)
local FlowerTime = 0.25
function getPlayer() local char = Tool.Parent return game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) end
function contains(t, v) for _, val in pairs(t) do if val == v then return true end end return false end
function tagHuman(human) local tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") tag.Value = getPlayer() tag.Name = "creator" tag.Parent = human game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(tag) end
function flower(pos) local flower = Instance.new("Part") flower.FormFactor = "Custom" flower.Anchored = true flower.CanCollide = false flower.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) flower.CFrame = CFrame.new( pos, pos + Vector3.new( math.random(-8, 8), -32, math.random(-8, 8) ) )
local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://225072270" mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://225072517" mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) mesh.Parent = flower
flower.Parent = workspace game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(flower, 5)
spawn(function() local size = math.random() * 2 while mesh.Scale.X < size do mesh.Scale = mesh.Scale + Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) * Heartbeat:wait() end end) end
function onEquip() if Equipping then return end
Equipping = true Equipped = true
--attach the feet local foot = Handle:Clone() foot.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=223832574" foot.Transparency = 0 foot.CanCollide = false
local right, left
local char = Tool.Parent if char then local humanoid = char:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid and humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then FootFrame = CFrame.new(0, 0.1, 0) end local lleg = char:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") or char:FindFirstChild("LeftFoot") if lleg then left = foot:Clone() left.Parent = char
local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = lleg weld.Part1 = left weld.C0 = FootFrame weld.Parent = weld.Part0
table.insert(Feet, left) end
local rleg = char:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") or char:FindFirstChild("RightFoot") if rleg then right = foot:Clone() right.Parent = char
foot.Mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://223832617"
local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = rleg weld.Part1 = right weld.C0 = FootFrame weld.Parent = weld.Part0
table.insert(Feet, right) end end
Equipping = false
local leftTimer = FlowerTime local rightTimer = 0 while Equipped do local dt = Heartbeat:wait()
leftTimer = leftTimer - dt if leftTimer <= 0 then flower(left.Position) leftTimer = FlowerTime end
rightTimer = rightTimer - dt if rightTimer <= 0 then flower(right.Position) rightTimer = FlowerTime end end end
function onUnequip() Equipped = false
for _, foot in pairs(Feet) do foot:Destroy() end Feet = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip)

local Player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer local UIS = game:GetService("UserInputService") local Mouse = Player:GetMouse() local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote") local Tracks = {} local InputType = Enum.UserInputType
function playAnimation(animName, ...) if Tracks[animName] then Tracks[animName]:Play() else local anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(animName) if anim and Tool.Parent and Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then Tracks[animName] = Tool.Parent.Humanoid:LoadAnimation(anim) playAnimation(animName, ...) end end end
function stopAnimation(animName) if Tracks[animName] then Tracks[animName]:Stop() end end
function inputBegan(input) if input.UserInputType == InputType.MouseButton1 then Remote:FireServer("LeftDown") end end
function inputEnded(input) if input.UserInputType == InputType.MouseButton1 then Remote:FireServer("LeftUp") end end
function onRemote(func, ...) if func == "PlayAnimation" then playAnimation(...) elseif func == "StopAnimation" then stopAnimation(...) end end
UIS.InputBegan:connect(inputBegan) UIS.InputEnded:connect(inputEnded) Remote.OnClientEvent:connect(onRemote)
